member.name: M:Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email.CreateFromTemplate(Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email)
member.summary: Creates a new from an email template object. The has not been saved. If there are objects associated with the template, then these pages are copied without sub pages in the page tree and the new page ids are associated with the new .
member.param: The template to base the on.
member.exception: Object 'template' is not marked as a template. Check template.IsTemplate property.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email.CreateFromTemplate(Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new from an email template object. The has not been saved. If there are objects associated with the template, then these pages are copied without sub pages in the page tree and the new page ids are associated with the new .
member.param: The template to base the on.
If the new should get a new subject, this can be specified here.
member.exception: Object 'template' is not marked as a template. Check template.IsTemplate property.
Object 'template' is created with page cannot be copied. Check template.PageId property.

member.name: M:Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email.CreateCopy(Dynamicweb.EmailMarketing.Email,System.Boolean,System.String)

member.param: The source to base the on.
If the new should get a new subject, this can be specified here.
member.exception: Object 'template' is not marked as a template. Check template.IsTemplate property.
Object 'template' is created with page cannot be copied. Check template.PageId property.
